name: squid game (online)
description:
this game is a copy of the original netflix serie squid game . you can play green light red light and the glass game with incredible graphics. with Mirror, you can play in online  with your friends  (you have to open your ports)https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=how+to+open+your+port 

the game is still in development and it's normal if there are some bugs. if you find one you can send me a message on discord Lucas le caribou#8330

controls:

wasd to move, space to jump , p to increase the sensitivity, o to decrease the sensitivity

how to run the game?

it's pretty simple, you have to click on the squid game icon, wait until the game  loads, click on Host(Server + client). if you wanna play online, you have to enter the host's ip at the right of client icon and enjoy the game

patch notes 10/31/2021:

- the game is now in fullscreen

- fix the spawn point

- you can now show the cursor by pressing escape to leave the server and join another

- UI optimization

- increased the FOV from 60 to 80  (multiplied by 8/6)

new features are comming soon ;)

enjoy
